Package com.advertisementproject.emailservice.db.entity

Class EmailDetails

java.lang.Object
com.advertisementproject.emailservice.db.entity.EmailDetails
@Entity
public class EmailDetails
extends java.lang.Object
Email details includes information needed to send a confirmation link email and is only meant for temporary storage until all details have been received for a user id, by which time an email will be sent and the database row deleted.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.lang.String email
    The email address to send the confirmation link email to.
    private java.lang.String name
    The name of the user to be included in the confirmation link email to be sent to the user.
    private java.lang.String token
    Token to add to the confirmation link included in the confirmation link email to be sent to the user.
    private java.util.UUID userId
    Primary id for EmailDetails entity, matching the user id.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    EmailDetails​(EmailDetailsMessage emailDetailsMessage)
    Constructor creating an email details object with all the information except token, which is left as null.
    EmailDetails​(TokenMessage tokenMessage)
    Constructor creating an email details object with user id and token.

  • Method Summary

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • userId

      private java.util.UUID userId
      Primary id for EmailDetails entity, matching the user id.

    • token

      private java.lang.String token
      Token to add to the confirmation link included in the confirmation link email to be sent to the user.

    • name

      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the user to be included in the confirmation link email to be sent to the user.

    • email

      private java.lang.String email
      The email address to send the confirmation link email to.

  • Constructor Details

    • EmailDetails

      public EmailDetails​(EmailDetailsMessage emailDetailsMessage)
      Constructor creating an email details object with all the information except token, which is left as null.
      Parameters:
      emailDetailsMessage - email details message received from User Service application

    • EmailDetails

      public EmailDetails​(TokenMessage tokenMessage)
      Constructor creating an email details object with user id and token. Remaining fields are left as null.
      Parameters:
      tokenMessage - token message received from Confirmation Token Service application
